original_text: You must wash your clothes on the seventh day, and you shall be clean. And afterward you may come into the camp.”
korean_text: 너희는 일곱째 날에 옷을 빨아서 깨끗하게 한 후에 진영에 들어올지니라

sentences.original_text: You must wash your clothes on the seventh day,
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 칠일째에 네 옷을 빨아야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: you may come into the camp.”
